item.title: Articles & Guides
item.description: <img src='https://www.bankless.com/assets/img/favicon/apple-touch-icon.png' /><br/>Crypto moves fast, with constant innovations, regulatory shifts, and market-defining moments. From Ethereum’s upgrades to Bitcoin’s institutional adoption, DeFi exploits, and NFT breakthroughs, we cover the most important stories shaping the decentralized future. Stay ahead with Bankless — your trusted source for crypto news and insights.

item.title: The Ethereum Foundation Just Doubled Down on DeFi
item.description: <img src='https://cdn.bankless.com/openGraph/the-ethereum-foundation-just-doubled-down-on-defi-1771893379.png' /><br/>The EF has formalized its DeFi strategy for the first time ever.

item.title: Articles & Guides
item.description: <img src='https://www.bankless.com/assets/img/favicon/apple-touch-icon.png' /><br/>Bitcoin isn’t just a cryptocurrency — it’s a financial revolution. As the dominant digital asset, it fuels a trillion-dollar industry, institutional adoption, and a vision for truly permissionless finance. With its fixed supply and role as digital gold, Bitcoin has grown to shape global markets. Bankless keeps you informed on its latest developments.

item.title: Vitalik Signals the End of the Rollup-Centric Roadmap: What's Next?
item.description: <img src='https://cdn.bankless.com/openGraph/vitalik-signals-the-end-of-the-rollup-centric-roadmap-what-s-next-1770464128.png' /><br/>A single Vitalik tweet just snapped Ethereum’s scaling narrative into focus: the rollup-centric roadmap is over, and a new path is here.

item.title: The Bankless Guide to Rocket Pool
item.description: <img src='https://cdn.bankless.com/openGraph/the-bankless-guide-to-rocket-pool-1758826844.png' /><br/>A Beginner's Guide to Rocket Pool: A Leading ETH Staking Protocol

item.title: A First-Principles Defense of Prediction Markets
item.description: <img src='https://cdn.bankless.com/openGraph/a-first-principles-defense-of-prediction-markets-1771693583.png' /><br/>Prediction markets are markets. Markets should be regulated at the federal level.

item.title: Ethereum's Last Big Upgrade: The zkEVM | Ansgar Dietrichs
item.description: <img src='https://cdn.bankless.com/openGraph/early-access-ethereum-s-last-big-upgrade-the-zkevm-ansgar-dietrichs-1771598671.png' /><br/>Ethereum’s next big leap might not look like a single “flip the switch” moment, but it could change how the chain verifies everything.

item.title: Decentralised Ethereum Liquid Staking Protocol
item.description: <img src='https://rocketpool.net/files/rp-logo-200x200.png' /><br/>Rocket Pool is a decentralised staking protocol providing liquid & node staking products for the Ethereum (ETH) ecosystem.

item.title: Articles & Guides
item.description: <img src='https://www.bankless.com/assets/img/favicon/apple-touch-icon.png' /><br/>Crypto can be complex, but Bankless makes it simple. Whether buying your first ETH, exploring DeFi, or comparing Layer 1s, our guides cover everything from wallet setup to advanced portfolio strategies — helping you master the decentralized world.
